comments: The 'key-field' is an optional field within the value that matches the key
There are four main dimensions to this test suite:
- key present in target value schema:
- aliasing of the key field in the value schema
Not all combinations are valid, e.g. can not have an alias is there is no key.
There is currently an inconsistency between how GROUP BY's and PARTITION BY's handling of aliases:
- PARTITION BY requires the target name, (i.e. the alias), failing if the source field name is used.
- GROUP BY requires the source field name, failing if the target field name, (i.e. the alias), is used.

tests.name: stream | initially null | no key change | - | -
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo INT, bar INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

tests.name: stream | initially null | partition by (-) | key in value | no aliasing
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo INT, bar INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT PARTITION BY foo;

tests.name: stream | initially null | partition by (-) | key in value | aliasing
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo INT, bar INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT foo AS ALIASED, bar FROM INPUT PARTITION BY ALIASED;

tests.name: stream | initially null | partition by (-) | key not in value | -
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo INT, bar INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT bar FROM INPUT PARTITION BY foo;

expectedException.message: Column FOO does not exist in the result schema. Error in Partition By clause.

tests.name: stream | initially null | group by (-) | key in value | no aliasing
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo INT, bar INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE TABLE OUTPUT AS SELECT foo, COUNT(*) FROM INPUT GROUP BY foo;

issues: key field of output has INCORRECT name: should be 'FOO'.
key field of output has INCORRECT type: should be 'INT

tests.name: stream | initially null | group by (-) | key in value | aliasing
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo INT, bar INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE TABLE OUTPUT AS SELECT foo AS Aliased, COUNT(*) FROM INPUT GROUP BY foo;

issues: key field of output has INCORRECT name: should be 'ALIASED'.
key field of output has INCORRECT type: should be 'INT'.

tests.name: stream | initially null | group by (-) | key not in value | -
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo INT, bar INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE TABLE OUTPUT AS SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INPUT GROUP BY foo;

issues: key field of output has INCORRECT name: should be 'ALIASED'.
key field of output has INCORRECT type: should be 'INT'.

tests.name: stream | initially set | no key change | key in value | no aliasing
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo INT, bar INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', key='foo', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo INT, bar INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', key='foo', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT foo as aliased, bar FROM INPUT;

issues: key field of output has INCORRECT name: should be 'ALIASED'.

tests.name: stream | initially set | no key change | key not in value | -
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo INT, bar INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', key='foo', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT bar FROM INPUT;

issues: key field of output INCORRECT: should be null.

tests.name: stream | initially set | partition by (same) | key in value | no aliasing
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo INT, bar INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', key='foo', value_format='JSON');

tests.name: stream | initially set | partition by (same) | key not in value | -
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo INT, bar INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', key='foo', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT bar FROM INPUT PARTITION BY foo;

expectedException.message: Column FOO does not exist in the result schema. Error in Partition By clause.

tests.name: stream | initially set | partition by (different) | key in value | no aliasing
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo INT, bar INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', key='foo', value_format='JSON');

tests.name: stream | initially set | partition by (different) | key in value | aliasing
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo INT, bar INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', key='foo', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT foo, bar AS aliased FROM INPUT PARTITION BY aliased;

tests.name: stream | initially set | partition by (different) | key not in value | -
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo INT, bar INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', key='foo', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT foo FROM INPUT PARTITION BY bar;

expectedException.message: Column BAR does not exist in the result schema. Error in Partition By clause.

tests.name: table | initially null | no key change | - | -
